src:
Isi Perut, Isi Pulsa & Semuanya Cuma Rp11!
07 Nov 2019, 18:44 by Yakob Arfin Tyas Sasongko - detikInet


Foto: Foto: Dok. DANA 11.11

Jakarta - Kini melakukan berbagai transaksi semakin mudah. Segala sesuatu jadi lebih praktis, murah dan semakin bikin hemat. Dengan berbagai promo yang ditawarkan, hadirnya dompet digital memberikan beragam kenyamanan buat kamu yang hobi nonton, belanja, isi pulsa hingga kulineran. Kali ini promo menarik dompet digital DANA siap memanjakan kamu lewat promo #Puas11Rupiah pada DANA 11.11. Dengan Promo #Puas11Rupiah, kamu pengguna DANA cukup bayar Rp11 untuk setiap transaksi seperti nonton, belanja, isi pulsa dan makan.Tanggal 8-11 November 2019, temukan langsung promo #Puas11Rupiah di aplikasi DANA, lalu kamu bisa menikmati promo tersebut di merchant F&B yang berpartisipasi dengan DANA seperti KFC, CFC, CRUNCHÄUS SALADS, Cuppa Coffee, Hongkong Sheng Kee Dessert, Hongkong Sheng Kee Kitchen, Hop-Hop, Kedai Kopi Kulo, Mister Baso, Pho Street, Pho Street Kitchen, Rice Bowl, Tamani Café, Tamani Express, Tamani Plus, The Halal Guys, Bakmi GM, Bari-Uma Ramen, Burger King, Burgreens, Burgreens Express, Caribou Coffee, serta Carl's Jr.Ada juga Ce Wei, DairyQueen, Dapur Solo, Domino's Pizza, Fore Coffee, Ichiban sushi, Mama Tina, MammaMia, Negiya, Pezzo Pizza, Sapo Oriental, Senandung Alam, ShuShu, Solaria, Sugakiya, Ta Wan, Walao-eh, Wingstop, dan Yoshinoya. Kamu bisa menikmati promo ini untuk TIX ID dan produk digital di aplikasi DANA seperti beli pulsa, bayar tagihan dan voucher games.Selama #Promo11Rupiah, kamu juga berkesempatan untuk memenangkan hadiah menarik mulai dari Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, Emas 10 gram, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, Tiket DWP, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, JBL Flip, Galaxy Buds, dan Saldo DANA.Promo belanja juga bisa kamu gunakan di Bukalapak dan Lazada dengan menggunakan DANA. Bisa juga nonton streaming di Vidio Cuma Rp11. Segera download aplikasi DANA, cek dan ikutan langsung promo #Puas11Rupiah supaya nggak ketinggalan! Info lengkapnya ada di sini.Simak Video "Cerita Putri Tanjung yang Hobi Berburu Diskon Makeup Online"[Gambas:Video 20detik](prf/fay)
text:
Fill Stomach, Recharge & Everything Just Rp11!
Nov 7 2019, 18:44 by Yakob Arfin Tyas Sasongko - detikInet


Photo: Photo: Doc. FUNDS 11.11

Jakarta - Now making various transactions easier. Everything is more practical, cheaper and more economical. With various promos on offer, the presence of a digital wallet provides a variety of conveniences for you who like watching, shopping, topping up to culinary. This time the attractive promo of the DANA digital wallet is ready to spoil you through the # Puas11Ruta promo on DANA 11.11. With the # Satisfaction #Ruta Promo, you DANA users simply pay Rp11 for every transaction such as watching, shopping, topping up and eating. Date 8-11 November 2019, find directly the # Satisfaction IDR in the DANA application, then you can enjoy the promo at F&B merchants that participating with FUNDS such as KFC, CFC, CRUNCHÄUS SALADS, Cuppa Coffee, Hongkong Sheng Kee Dessert, Hongkong Sheng Kee Kitchen, Hop-Hop, Kulo Coffee Shop, Mister Baso, Pho Street, Pho Street Kitchen, Rice Bowl, Tamani Café, Tamani Express , Tamani Plus, The Halal Guys, Bakmi GM, Bari-Uma Ramen, Burger King, Burgreens, Burgreens Express, Caribou Coffee, and Carl's Jr. There are also Ce Wei, DairyQueen, Solo Kitchen, Domino's Pizza, Fore Coffee, Ichiban sushi, Mama Tina, MammaMia, Negiya, Pezzo Pizza, Sapo Oriental, Natural Humor, ShuShu, Solaria, Sugakiya, Ta Wan, Walao-eh, Wingstop, and Yoshinoya. You can enjoy this promo for TIX ID and digital products on DANA applications such as buying credit, paying bills and voucher games. During # Promo11 Rupiah, you also have the opportunity to win attractive prizes starting from Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, 10 gram Gold, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, DWP Tickets, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, JBL Flip, Galaxy Buds, and FUNDS. You can also use shopping promos at Bukalapak and Lazada using FUNDS. You can also watch streaming at just Rp. 11. Immediately download the DANA application, check and follow along with the # Puas11Ruta promo so you don't miss it! Full info is here.
